document_data.name: Limeleech
document_data.home: [[Lodge of the Society of Brilliance|The Lodge]], [[Baldur's Gate]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''Limeleech''' was a [[drow]] professor and a member of the [[Society of Brilliance]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|''Strange to think that I'm both brilliant and extremely attractive.''|Limeleech.}}
document_data.Personality: She had the self-assurance that she was both exceptionally smart and exceptionally good-looking. Her ambition was to attain fame for her scholarly achievements.
document_data.Relationships: She couldn't help but feel jealous of [[Blurg]]'s impressive intellect and she didn't hide it.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Limeleech lived in the [[Lodge of the Society of Brilliance]] and was actively working on her research paper, revealing that [[gnoll]]s' heightened aggression could be attributed to [[hyena]] [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mite mite] infections.
